articles.title: People Are Sharing The Wildest Things Their Older Siblings Convinced Them Of As Kids, And I'm Cracking Up
articles.description: "She told me 'Don’t Stop Believin' was America’s national anthem. I believed her. I was an adult."
articles.content:
"So I reminded her of all the cool things we were about to receive. She had told me this to get me to stop annoying her and go play Nintendo instead."
